required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Carrillizumab is Used for Advanced Liver Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Real World Study of Treatment Regimens Containing Camrelizumab in Patients With Advanced Liver Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: First Affiliated Hospital Xi'an Jiaotong University

clinical_study.source: First Affiliated Hospital Xi'an Jiaotong University

brief_summary.textblock: To observe and evaluate the safety and efficacy of camrelizumab in advanced liver cancer

detailed_description.textblock: camrelizumab ， a humanized monoclonal antibody against PD-1, has been shown to block the binding of PD-1 to PD-L1, thereby inhibiting the immune escape of tumor cells. It has a high affinity for PD-1 (KD = 3.31 nmol/L), a high acceptor proportion (85% at 200 mg) of circulating T lymphocytes, and binds to epitopes different from Nivolumab and pembrolizumab，Phase 1 clinical trials have shown that camrelizumab is well tolerated and has antitumor activity in patients with advanced solid tumors.camrelizumab has been approved for indication for advanced hepatocellular carcinoma The main objective of this study was to observe and evaluate the safety and efficacy of treatment regiments containing carrelizumab in advanced liver cancer。 The subjects included people over 18 years old， For men and women with advanced liver cancer confirmed by histopathology or cytology;

primary_outcome.measure: Assess Safety as defined by the NCI CTCAE v5.0
primary_outcome.time_frame: From ptients participate in the clinical study to 90 days after the end of treatment
primary_outcome.description: Adverse evets as graded by CTCAE v5.0

arm_group.arm_group_label: Camrelizumab in the treatment of liver cancer
arm_group.description: Camrelizumab intravenous infusion (no need for prophylactic administration), no less than 30 min

intervention.description: camrelizumab 200 mg, intravenous infusion (no need for prophylactic administration), no less than 30 min ，No more than 60 min, Q2W, one cycle every 2 weeks (14 days) or Q3W, one cycle every 3 weeks (21 days). Try to complete the administration before the ECG
intervention.arm_group_label: Camrelizumab in the treatment of liver cancer

overall_official.affiliation: First Affiliated Hospital Xi'an Jiaotong University

facility.name: First Affiliated Hospital of Xi'an Jiaotong University
